feed.title: Brendan Regnery
feed.subtitle: The personal website of Brendan Regnery.

entry.title: UC Davis GradOPS
entry.content:
The physics graduate students at the University of California, Davis recently created a new graduate council. I am excited to serve as the 2018-2019 colloquium committee representative for this new organization.

Find out more about the Graduate Organization of Physics Students (GradOPS) on the gradOPS website.
entry.summary: The physics graduate students at the University of California, Davis recently created a new graduate council. I am excited to serve as the 2018-2019 colloquium committee representative for this new organization.

entry.title: Website Up and Running!
entry.content:
I am excited that this website is finally up and running!

This Website was build using Jekyll with the Jekyll Doc Theme. I highly recommend the Jekyll Doc Theme; It is well coded and uses bootstrap to go the extra step in making a gorgeous design.

For the logo, I used logomakr, which is a free logo making website.

Please enjoy my website! And feel free to use the links on this post to make your own!
entry.summary: I am excited that this website is finally up and running!
